= updateByID() =
Class level method which allows you to pass in an id, update the row and return the record. This method returns the object with the `id` you specified. If the object did not pass validation it will be returned anyway but nothing will be saved to the database.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Type* ||
|| id || yes || numeric || ||
|| attributes || yes, if no named arguments are present || struct || ||
|| named argument(s) || yes, if no `attributes` argument is present || || ||
